mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRD_IDX, PRD_NAME, PRD_IMG, PRD_THUMB, PRD_PRICE, PRD_COST, PRD_QTY, PRD_USEYN, INPUT_ID, INPUT_DATE ) VALUES ( ( SELECT 'PRD'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||DECODE(LPAD(MAX(SUBSTR(PRD_IDX, -3))+1, 3, 0), NULL, '001', LPAD(MAX(SUBSTR(PRD_IDX, -3))+1, 3, 0)) FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRD_IDX LIKE '%'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'%' ), #{prdName}, #{prdImg}, #{prdThumb}, #{prdPrice}, #{prdCost}, #{prdQty}, #{prdUseYn}, #{inputId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )
